titleStmt.title: Dove. An almanack for the yeare since the nativitie of our Lord, 1635 Being the third after bissextile or leap-yeare; and from our Saviours passion, 1602. Being also the yeare from the Worlds creation, 5584. Calculated properly for the famous Universitie and town of Cambridge, where the pole is elevated above the horizon 52 degrees and 17 minutes.
titleStmt.author: Dove, Jonathan.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the printers to the Vniversitie of Cambridge,
